sentence: The only lawmaker who has faced lingering consequences is Wyoming Republican Rep. Liz Cheney, who was removed from her leadership position in the House Republican conference after repeatedly criticizing former President Trump for his role in the January 6 riot.
author: Rebecca Kaplan
title: McCarthy says Madison Cawthorn is "wrong" about Zelenskyy
